channel.title: Farming Mod v2.0.0 mrhid6
channel.description:
there a Bug the Farming Mod wont let it view the cost, can only see the word "cost" so if i want to add Ramp or something can only see "cost" but not the Icon of what anything cost like Cable or Wire or Iron Plate / Rod etc etc
When i click Remove for Farming Mod can now view any cost like Iron plate ***/*** Wire ***/*** the star * is how many needed etc
